Q_DESC:
Get series of integers from the user. Check the condition that the difference between each element is same. If it so then the series is arithmetic. Let N be the number of test cases and n be the number of input integers. If the difference in the arithmetic slice is not same then print not arithmetic.
Input format: Get the integers in a sequence order. The elements can be same and make all possibilities. 
Output format: Print the total number of possibilities in the arithmetic slice subsequence 
Explanation: The sequence contains any integer and all possibilities are checked. The output is the total number of possibilities. The difference of the series is same, then it is arithmetic. If the difference is not same then print it is not arithmetic.
